attributes.action: STOP PCN as easy target near schools, allow grace time before enforcing tickets.
attributes.additional_details: Traffic warden was again issuing the tickets to parents who just take their children to school! Why??? Absolutely ridiculous & outrageous. It is obvious, this is the easiest and quickest way to earn cash, but can this be stopped? Shouldn't​ there be a discretionary period for parents to bring and collect their children, to and from school in restricted streets & controlled zones near schools? Can we have the appropriate grace time when sensibly parked with safety at heart for our children?
attributes.background: Car surveillance, Traffic wardens like 'Predators waiting to pounce' on parents dropping off & picking up children.This is a form of victimising & punishing parents for bringing children to schools. Grace time of 10/15 mins will allow safe drop off and pick up in controlled zone before enforcing PCN

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parking is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
